thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: Richard Rv

author: Richard Rv
title: Richard Rv
text: I have placed an order long in advance to ensure my other half gets her anniversary flowers as she was abroad at the time. They contacted me at the end of supposed delivery day to inform me that they can't deliver. Unacceptable for a florist, I did not have enough time to arrange with a different florist. Huge disappointment and a poor late communication. I am keeping my fingers crossed for a refund now.
